data.title: Ghost of Tsushima Mythic Tale guide: The Undying Flame walkthrough
data.meta_description: The Undying Flame Mythic Tale sees Jhin climb Mount Jogaku to learn the Way of the Flame. Climb the mountain without freezing to death, duel Bettomaru, and learn to light your blade on fire
data.text:
Ghost of Tsushimas The Undying Flame Mythic Tale is the seventh and final youll encounter, and it will net you a powerful ability for your journey. In this walkthrough, well show you how to acquire the Way of the Flame.

Step 1. Finding the musician

At the start of every Mythic Tale, youll need to find a musician in the world  rumors from townspeople, especially from the Golden Temple, can help mark the musician on the map. For The Undying Flame, go just south west of Mount Jogaku in the Kamiagata region.

Talk to the musician there, and listen to his tale.

Step 2. Ascend Mount Jogaku

The Undying Flame introduces a unique mechanic, found only in this quest: freezing. If Jin wanders too far from the fire, hell start to freeze. If you dont return Jin to a fire or find a new one, he will quickly lose health until he dies.

To ascend Mount Jogaku, youll need to pinball your way between campsites. Standing near the fires to warm yourself up, and then moving on to the next camp.

This quest step is pretty easy, as theres usually only one path toward the next camp. Just follow the path quickly and youll find the next fire.

Fire 1

Your first camp is just up the cliff, through the field, north of the musician. Climb the rocks and youll find the fire.

Fire 2

Once you warm up, climb up the rocks in front of you and run over the bridge. Kill the dog on the other side and keep running straight. When you reach another group of rocks, climb it and turn right, up the hill, to reach the fire.

Fire 3

When youre ready to go, stand on the rock next to the fire. Youll see the next location sitting on a distant cliff. And if you look closely, youll find another dog. Shoot the dog to make your path easier.

Run forward and jump into the chasm, using your grappling hook to catch yourself on the tree. On the other side, climb up the cliff to your left to find the next campfire.

Fire 4

Take out your bow and look to your left. Try and snipe as many dogs as you can, as there are several here who will try and impede your progress. You can get most of them before leaving the safety of the fire.

When theyre gone, run left along the path and climb the rocks ahead of you. Keep climbing until you reach some handholds. Use them to climb the last cliff, and youll find the next camp, complete with a living samurai. Talk to the samurai while you warm up.

Fire 5

Take a left from the camp and run along the snowy path. Climb all the way up the large grouping of rocks on your left, and use the tree bridge to walk over to the mountain. Turn left and use your grappling hook to reach the other side of the gap. Youll find an unlit fire. Light it and rest.

Fire 6

Run forward here, up the rock and across the tightrope. Use the branch to your right to climb, and then grapple onto the stump across the gap. Use the grappling hook on two branches and youll reach another unlit camp. Light it and rest.

The dojo

Run forward and jump into the pit, using your grappling hook to latch onto the stump in the cliff. Climb up and use the handholds to reach the top of the mountain. Turn right and jump the gap. Climb the rock and youll see some lanterns. Walk up the stairs to the dojo. Youll meet Bettomaru, who will teach you how to light your sword on fire.

Step 3. Pick up the rock

After you talk to Bettomaru, hell ask you to pick up a rock so he can teach you his technique. Follow the quest marker to his dueling arena. Grab the rock and prepare to face the master of flame.

Bettomaru duel boss fight

Bettomaru is easy compared to the Kojiro duel from The Six Blades of Kojiro Mythic Tale.

Like always, make sure you swap out your armor to something that focuses on health, damage reduction, or an increase to damage (we used the Sakai Clan Armor).

Parry his attacks and dodge his unblockable, red strikes.

Bettomaru will occasionally light his blade on fire. This just turns most of his moves red, so dodge and keep striking to reduce his posture.

A bit before hes at half health, Bettomaru will instruct you to ignite your katana by hitting the R1 button. Oblige him.

Continue the duel until Bettomaru has about a third of his health left. Hell call it and give you some Incendiary Oil  a Ghost Weapon that lets you light your blade on fire during battle, burning your foes.

Step 4. Descend Mt. Jogaku and return to the musician

After your duel, you need to descend the mountain. Walk up to the stairs leading back to Fire 6, and youll see a white circle. Interact with it, and Jin will automatically teleport to the bottom.

When you load in, return to the musician to finish the quest. In addition to your new Way of the Flame technique, youll earn the Izanamis Grief sheathe. Youll also earn the Purity of War mask if youve completed all the other Mythic Tales.
